Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, west of the Oceancrest Hot Springs.
Room.LongDescription: The North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa provide countless people with deluxe accomodations in small pools of flowing, natural mineral water, heated by the lava flow underneath the city. Being so close to the ocean puts Oceancrest on a bad fault line where quakes sometimes happen. The upshot of this being the lava flow heats up the natural mineral water beneath the city.
